ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank Rod Walton, Coordinator, Fermilab National Environmental Research Park (NERP) for facilitating access and assisting with data collection, and US Army Garrison West Point Natural Resource Manager Christopher Pray and other West Point personnel for allowing and facilitating access to field sites. We also thank all field assistants and all members of the Ecology and Management of Invasive Plants Program at Cornell University for their contributions during this research.
